The pod lands and a confused protohuman walks up to
it. The dna scanners come online and scan the
protohuman, who runs off screaming. A bot tall(9 ft.),
blueish bot comes out.

--- CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@...> wrote:
> Veratis' scanners alert him to the incoming pod.
> "Ah, another bot for me to
> save from the wages of war." It was still to early
> to tell if it was a
> Maximal or Predacon chip inside but the old
> scientist never worried about
> those sorts of things. "I guess I'll have to take a
> short trip to greet our
> new guest." The old bot set the scanners on
> automatic record and set off to
> the north accompanied by three of his drones, one of
> which carried medical
> suplies that might be needed if the bot was injured.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...>
> To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, November 13, 2001 8:04 AM
> Subject: Veratis's Problem
>

> >

> of
